name: nebular

related to a nebula (= a cloud of gas or dust in space, appearing either bright or dark): a vast nebular cloud which covers most of Orion the nebular stage of the universe See
nebula
More examplesFewer examplesGeologic changes are results of the unexpended heat caused by nebular condensation.The nebular spectrograph was captured by the 200-inch telescope. How does a solar system develop from an individual nebular mass?
